fields.name: TerritoryID
fields.description: Primary key for SalesTerritory records. Identity / Auto increment column

fields.name: CountryRegionCode
fields.description: ISO standard country or region code. Foreign key to CountryRegion.CountryRegionCode.

fields.name: Group
fields.description: Geographic area to which the sales territory belong.

fields.name: SalesYTD
fields.description: Sales in the territory year to date. Default: 0.00

fields.name: SalesLastYear
fields.description: Sales in the territory the previous year. Default: 0.00

fields.name: CostYTD
fields.description: Business costs in the territory year to date. Default: 0.00

fields.name: CostLastYear
fields.description: Business costs in the territory the previous year. Default: 0.00

fields.name: rowguid
fields.description: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Used to support a merge replication sample. Default: newid()

fields.name: ModifiedDate
fields.description: Date and time the record was last updated. Default: getdate()
